mapper.select: SELECT id as "dictValue", project_name as "dictLabel" FROM project_basic WHERE del = false AND status = '${@com.geek.workbench.common.ProjectStatusEnum@RELEASE.value}'

SELECT project.id as "dictValue", project.project_name as "dictLabel" FROM project_basic project left join project_manager manager on project.id = manager.project_id WHERE project.del = false AND project.status = '${@com.geek.workbench.common.ProjectStatusEnum@RELEASE.value}' AND manager.del = false AND manager.user_id = #{userId}
